item.title: ScriptKiddie
item.description: Overview ScriptKiddie is an easy linux box, designed by 0xdf. Overall the exploitation of this box consists of a command injection vulnerability in Metasploit Framework’s msfvenom payload generator to get access as a low privileged user. From there, a command injection to reach the next user and a pretty straight forward sudo access privilege escalation method to get root. Reconnaissance Port Scan We will start our port scan by using nmap, specifically the following command:

item.title: whoami
item.description: My name is Chrysostomos Manousis and I am a Cybersecurity enthusiast who works as a SOC Analyst. I hold a masterâ€™s degree in Electrical and Computer Engineering, focused on Software and Hardware Engineering. I am certified as a Junior Penetration Tester (eJPT) by eLearnSecurity and currently pursuing the OSCP cerification. The purpose of this blog is to share my knowledge and thoughts on a variety of cybersecurity related topics as well as my HackTheBox writeups.
